Title: Tales of the Rays
Description: ['Includes an animated promotional/opening video for the iOS/Android game ', Tales of the Rays, ' and the main promotional video. Bandai Namco announced it was a sequel to ', Tales of the Rays, ' and streamed the video on their official YouTube channel.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The game and videos star new characters Ickx Neve and Mileena Weiss along with a cast of returning characters from other ', Tales of, ' games.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' In a nontraditional manner, no new game app will be created, rather the current game app will receive a massive update and discontinue the main story line and start anew (several years later in-story) resetting the game play for all users. The story is said to take a darker tone.', ' ', ' ', ' ', " The game's production was announced in 2015 and the official launch is expected some time later this year.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: ANN, edited)']
Related: ['Alternative version: Sousei no Aquarion', 'Other: Aquarion Movie: Ippatsu Gyakuten-hen']
